meta.name: description
meta.content: Bensalem Township School District is a premier educational institution in Bucks County. We provide a first class education for the whole child that challenges and supports each student to discover a passion for learning while designing and achieving a personal vision of success.

section.class: content-container news1-container slick-container content-size-small orientation-horizontal thumbnail-orientation-horizontal

img.alt: Sign with red border that says

h3.a: Important Remote Learning/School Closure/Coronavirus Information - Updated April 15, 2020

img.alt: Word Important in black surrounded by purple

h3.a: Meals for Children While Schools Are Closed

div.div: Children can enjoy delicious free breakfasts and lunches provided by the Bensalem Township School District Food Service Department. The district will utilize its Summer Food Service Program eligibility through a waiver from the State to serve children 18 years and younger during this closure. A bagged grab and go breakfast and lunch will be available at the below locations from 11:00 am to 1:00 pm beginning on Tuesday, March 17, 2020 (Monday through Friday) and throughout the closure. Children must be present to receive meals or parent must have their child's student ID. Click the title of the article to see more details.

img.alt: BTSD Chromebook Logo

div.div: As the Bensalem Township School District continues to map out strategies for virtual instruction and remote learning experiences our district will begin providing students/families with a Chromebook for instructional use as well as a tool for parents to be able to contact teachers through e-mail. Click the link above for more information.

img.alt: NAMM Foundation logo surrounded by photos of violin, mic, drum and the words

h3.a: Bensalem Named One of 2020 Best Communities for Music Education

div.div: Every year the NAMM Foundation creates a list of the Best Communities for Music Education. We are proud to announce that Bensalem Township School District was awarded this honor and is now one of the 2020 Best Communities for Music Education!

img.alt: School Nutrition Association Logo with a red apple with a bite out of it

div.div: Bensalem Township School District is pleased to announce that our Food Service Coordinator, Pauline Welch, is one of four school nutrition professionals being awarded up to $65,000 worth of equipment to benefit our school meal programs through the Winston Equipment Grant, the Vulcan/Hobart Equipment Grant and two Collection Grants (comprised of donations from multiple equipment companies).

Bensalem Township School District is a premier educational institution in Bucks County. We provide a first class education for the whole child that challenges and supports each student to discover a passion for learning while designing and achieving a personal vision of success.
